synopsis.text:
Earth's expansion into the cosmos has led to the colonization of numerous planets, including Jerra, which has been ravaged by a relentless war. To combat the threat, the Jerran army created the Most Dangerous Soldiers (MDS), elite warriors with extraordinary abilities. Among them is Geist, a genetically engineered soldier with an insatiable thirst for battle. Due to his uncontrollable nature, Geist is cryogenically frozen and locked away in an orbital satellite.

When the satellite crashes back onto Jerra, Geist awakens to find the planet on the brink of destruction. A doomsday device, known as Death Force, threatens to annihilate all life on the war-torn world. With his unmatched combat skills, Geist becomes humanity's last hope.

Joined by a woman named Vaiya and a group of Jerran army survivors, Geist embarks on a perilous journey to stop the Death Force. As they traverse the desolate wasteland, they face countless challenges and engage in intense battles. Can Geist, the very weapon created to wage war, now turn the tide and save the planet from total destruction? Experience the thrilling adventure as the ultimate soldier fights for redemption in a world that once sought to destroy him.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
